attributes.action: commit to meet with the Dalai Lama.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister has not yet said whether he will meet with the Dalai Lama, who in 1989 was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize for his consistent opposition to the use of violence in the quest for Tibetan self-rule. A meeting will send a message that the UK does not tacitly approve of violence in Tibet against Tibetans.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
